item.title: [DELTA]Shop Help NEEDED[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @StormpkScape StormpkScape
item.description:
@StormpkScape wrote:

I’m trying to add a 1B Token Exchange shop on my server but can’t quite get it right here is the codes

for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) { TotPrice2 = (int) Math.floor( GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot)); Slot = GetItemSlot(995); Slot2 = GetItemSlot(1000); Slot5 = GetItemSlot(3706); if (MyShopID != 38) { if (Slot5 == -1 && MyShopID == 38) { sM("You don't have enough 1B Tokens."); break; }

if(MyShopID != 38) { if (MyShopID == 38) { if (playerItemsN[Slot5] >= TotPrice2) { if (freeSlots() > 0) { deleteItem(3706, GetItemSlot(3706), TotPrice2); addItem(itemID, 1); server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1; server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) { server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0; } } else { sM("Not enough space in your inventory."); break; } } else { sM("Not enough 1B Tokens for this item."); } }
it comes up with this in compiler

client.java:7442: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Slot5 location: class client Slot5 = GetItemSlot(3706); ^ client.java:7459: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Slot5 location: class client if (Slot5 == -1 && MyShopID == 38) { ^ client.java:7608: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Slot5 location: class client if (playerItemsN[Slot5] >= TotPrice2) { ^ Note: EconomyReset.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 3 errors Finished!

Read full topic
